before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"2qrmk","text":"Supplies and Reagents","type":"header-two","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5scnm","text":"Extraction","type":"header-four","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"c22mc","text":"            Supplies: Centrifuge bottles, Pipettes, test tubes, funnels, filter papers, Pasteur pipettes, beakers","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1t4c7","text":"            Reagents: phosphate buffer, chloroform, methanol, soil samples","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6jv6a","text":"Separation/Fractionation","type":"header-four","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"32d3g","text":"            Supplies: vacuum, manifold, silica SPE columns 500 mg, test tubes, pipettes (including capillary pipettes), beakers","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3kfju","text":"            Reagents: methanol, chloroform, acetone","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6ffom","text":"Methylation","type":"header-four","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"pfqj","text":"            Supplies: Vortex, water bath, test tubes, pipettes (0.5 mL, 2 mL, 1 mL, 10 mL), Pasteur pipettes, beakers","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dfcrr","text":"            Reagents: 0.2 N acetic acid, 0.2 N KOH in methanol, chloroform, toluene, chloroform-extracted water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

groups.title: SoWa RI Anaerobic and Molecular Microbiology (public)

guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"6hm4","text":"NOTES:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3bhia","text":"All glassware must be fired in aluminum foil at 450°C for at least 4.5 hours to remove all organic substances.  Care must be used in organic-free technique to minimize contaminations between samples.  Any equipment which cannot be fired must be rinsed with methanol followed by chloroform and allowed to dry to remove any organics.  All transfers of solution MUST OCCUR IN A FUME HOOD.  Fatty acids are somewhat photosensitive, so care should be taken to minimize exposure to light.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.section: Extraction of Lipids from Soils -First Extraction
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3m75","text":"Add 5 g of soil (fresh mass) to a centrifuge bottle (250 mL).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"cgpqd","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","guid":"2958B470791D47C49677694D49628385","id":"6525","label":"soil (fresh mass)","unit":"6"}}}}

steps.section: Extraction of Lipids from Soils -First Extraction
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fv230","text":"Add 5 mL of chloroform, 10 mL of methanol, and 4 mL of phosphate buffer* minus the water content of the soil. 1 mL of chloroform for each g of soil, volumes should be 1:2:0.8 chloroform:methanol:buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5ac5b","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ei5bd","text":"*50 mM phosphate buffer: 8.7 g K2HPO4 in 1 L D.I. water which has been chloroform extracted.  Adjust pH with 3.5 ml 6 N HCl to 7.4","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"b9p7u","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"fvqq","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"3k8l2","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","guid":"3D51CAD75B0F41B6B2B1122D6CAF96C6","id":"6526","label":"chloroform","unit":"2"}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","guid":"00DB8812CD1C4B1A8136024C02F575D0","id":"6527","label":"methanol","unit":"2"}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"4","guid":"40C4CB86F1814A2FA690BADC5EC2E1E9","id":"6528","label":"phosphate buffer (50mM, pH 7.4)","unit":"2"}}}}

steps.section: Extraction of Lipids from Soils -First Extraction
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dmm6n","text":"Swirl.  Extract wrapped in foil for 2 hours.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"f07nh","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":"7200","guid":"62C9A1485C654A50B24A7470B3629CB6","id":"15585","label":"extraction"}}}}

steps.section: Extraction of Lipids from Soils -First Extraction
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"c0tfs","text":"Spin centrifuge bottles at 2500 rpm for 20-30 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3t25f","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"b6uoe","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"command","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"description":"2,500 rpm","guid":"47A4A926341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","name":"CENTRIFUGE","os_name":"","os_version":""}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":"1200","guid":"4241C2EEAB9E4C35961F30CB6A04AE81","id":"15586","label":""}}}}

steps.section: Extraction of Lipids from Soils - Second Extraction
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4p6t2","text":"Add additional 5 mL of chloroform and 5 mL of buffer to break the phase and achieve a final ratio of 1:1:0.9 chloroform : methanol : buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"29i2h","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"elbr4","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","guid":"34E698868E2F4E7E80FFBA323837B5D8","id":"6529","label":"chloroform","unit":"2"}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","guid":"D2D09DBC5B7643738984B80889A2E6E9","id":"6530","label":"phosphate buffer","unit":"2"}}}}

steps.section: Extraction of Lipids from Soils - Second Extraction
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6vgel","text":"Swirl.  Allow to separate overnight (approx 18 hours) covered to protect lipids from light.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ef24p","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":"64800","guid":"49ABA82928C74368A9A8776818BB74E8","id":"15587","label":"extraction in dark"}}}}

steps.section: Extraction of Lipids from Soils - Second Extraction
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cjqn0","text":"Spin centrifuge bottles at 2500 rpm for additional 20-30 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2sa0b","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"21k71","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"command","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"description":"2,500 rpm","guid":"47A4ABCF341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","name":"CENTRIFUGE","os_name":"","os_version":""}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":"1200","guid":"90DCC6A51A0D4E62887EE35BC9872A9E","id":"15588","label":""}}}}

steps.section: Extraction of Lipids from Soils - Second Extraction
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"b0f1b","text":"Transfer organic phase to a test tube through a Whatman #2 filter paper and evaporate solvent under N2.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":101,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Extraction of Lipids from Soils - Second Extraction
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3pnu6","text":"Store in sealed test tubes under N2 at –20°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":34,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Extraction of Lipids from Leaf Litter
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"37pbs","text":"Place 250 mg equivalent dry weight of ground litter in 20 mL test tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"49mv6","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"250","guid":"704A034E8D62416D99B9FBD0799FBEBF","id":"6531","label":"dry weight of ground litter","unit":"5"}}}}

steps.section: Extraction of Lipids from Leaf Litter
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bculn","text":"Add 1.6 mL potassium phosphate buffer (subtract moisture in litter from the 1.6 mL of buffer), 4 mL methanol, 2 mL cholorform (solvents should be in final ratio of 0.8 : 2 : 1).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"33op3","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"180ei","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"8uhf0","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1.6","guid":"42195AFF70384FAAB059D3640F19ABB2","id":"6532","label":"potassium phosphate buffer","unit":"2"}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"4","guid":"950DDFCF3882430882758128847DC7D7","id":"6533","label":"methanol","unit":"2"}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","guid":"8EF83014DC2A477DAFA9DE325F11D0F6","id":"6534","label":"chloroform","unit":"2"}}}}

steps.section: Extraction of Lipids from Leaf Litter
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"10d66","text":"Vortex each tube for 30 seconds.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dulve","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":"30","guid":"A7978B532B0A4B44B57E11206188F7BC","id":"15589","label":"vortex"}}}}

steps.section: Extraction of Lipids from Leaf Litter
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3omkn","text":"Place in 37°C water bath fro 30 minutes, vortexing every 5 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"eqka6","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"4dsk5","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"1CE60BAEB7CC48E78536073EE0BC4B5B","id":"1281","label":"water bath","temperature":"37","unit":"10"}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":"1800","guid":"8B6D552AF0DE4967908E84D69363C6B8","id":"15590","label":"vortexing every 5 minutes"}}}}

steps.section: Extraction of Lipids from Leaf Litter
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4qbp1","text":"Pipette out liquid (leave litter) into 2nd test tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":40,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Extraction of Lipids from Leaf Litter
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7p84e","text":"Add additional 1.6 mL buffer, 4 mL methanol, and 2 mL chloroform to original test tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5m429","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"5jmu4","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"1q1p7","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1.6","guid":"CACA5D44B2BE45CCA054A95AB6F00053","id":"6535","label":"phosphate buffer","unit":"2"}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"4","guid":"A14A6E94A2224886A05B93227E5CFC52","id":"6536","label":"methanol","unit":"2"}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","guid":"83E5638A87F541B39ACE035938AB77A5","id":"6537","label":"chloroform","unit":"2"}}}}

steps.section: Extraction of Lipids from Leaf Litter
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"767ru","text":"Incubate at 37 °C for 30 minutes, vortexing every 5 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"cdido","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"58flh","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"EE30316EB0E34F2C88C123E6E5673A7B","id":"1282","label":"water bath","temperature":"37","unit":"10"}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":"1800","guid":"A907EF2FEAF44E0D94196CF0817E287C","id":"15591","label":""}}}}

steps.section: Extraction of Lipids from Leaf Litter
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fjop6","text":"Pipette out as much liquid as possible into 2nd test tube. Discard original test tube with leaf litter.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":45,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Extraction of Lipids from Leaf Litter
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"efu68","text":"Add additional 4 mL chloroform and 4 mL of buffer to second tube. Vortex for 30 seconds.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"b56lh","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"etu9k","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"31b3j","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"4","guid":"AADF41DAEFE347089B5AE58891005C1C","id":"6538","label":"chloroform","unit":"2"}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"4","guid":"300327F09AD244758A8E2D337ED8CFA8","id":"6539","label":"phosphate buffer","unit":"2"}},"2":{"type":"command","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"description":"30s","guid":"47A4AC3E341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","name":"VORTEX","os_name":"","os_version":""}}}}

steps.section: Extraction of Lipids from Leaf Litter
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"de7jb","text":"Allow to separate overnight.  Remove lower phase only to small test tube by passing through a Whatman #2 filter paper.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":49,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Extraction of Lipids from Leaf Litter
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9o1qm","text":"Store tubes, sealed, under N2 at –20 °C. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":28,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Fractionation of Lipids
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"19he6","text":"Prepare columns by flushing them first with methanol to dehydrate them, then with chloroform to prepare them for the lipid.  Pull the solvents through with a very low vacuum*.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":44,"length":8},{"style":"italic","offset":82,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2g3ql","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6gnco","text":"*Vacuum should be 5” Hg or less or the column may collapse.  The prep rinses and chloroform and acetone extractions may be collected in a waste container in the manifold and discarded before inserting test tubes for the methanol elution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Fractionation of Lipids
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"81sf3","text":"Allow lipids to reach room temperature. Resuspend the dried lipids in 150 μL of chloroform and transfer to the column.  Repeat for a total of 4 transfers per sample. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":80,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6u1k9","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"150","guid":"43282DBF7B9740749CFE0AD688980D42","id":"6540","label":"chloroform","unit":"1"}}}}

steps.section: Fractionation of Lipids
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4lkh9","text":"Elute neutral lipids with 5 mL of chloroform. Pull solvent through with a low vacuum.  Discard solvent. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":34,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ea8pq","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","guid":"A2BBE59A3254481A90B50BD0FE42EA88","id":"6541","label":"chloroform","unit":"2"}}}}

steps.section: Fractionation of Lipids
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ci3q","text":"Elute glycolipids with 5 mL of acetone. Pull solvent through with a low vacuum.  Discard solvent. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":31,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"111ki","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","guid":"63573FD2395A4235BAF32A16510F2EEC","id":"6542","label":"acetone","unit":"2"}}}}

steps.section: Fractionation of Lipids
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4ua86","text":"Elute phospholipids with 5 mL of methanol under vacuum into a test tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":33,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3u85u","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","guid":"EC43861B8EE747C7969C6D8DC930C644","id":"6543","label":"methanol","unit":"2"}}}}

steps.section: Fractionation of Lipids
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"csrnd","text":"Blow off solvent (methanol) with the N2 Store dried PLFAs under N2 at –20 °C until methylation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":38,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":65,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Methylation- formation of fatty acid methyl esters
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dck38","text":"Remove samples from freezer and allow them to reach room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Methylation- formation of fatty acid methyl esters
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"kvne","text":"Make 0.2 N methanolic KOH by dissolving 0.28 g KOH in 25 mL of methanol. KOH absorbs water from the air, so movement from the balance to the methanol is critical.  Make fresh every day. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1lue4","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"25","guid":"F3C138D63454442E8C48EDC9E92AD20B","id":"6544","label":"0.2N methanolic KOH","unit":"2"}}}}

steps.section: Methylation- formation of fatty acid methyl esters
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bdh86","text":"Make 0.2 N acetic acid if none already made by diluting 1.15 mL glacial acetic acid to 100 mL total volume with chloroform extracted D.I.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fptiu","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","guid":"7AFCDDAE1D5E4C3294CD26579C1C27F5","id":"6545","label":"0.2 N acetic acid","unit":"2"}}}}

steps.section: Methylation- formation of fatty acid methyl esters
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"75jg","text":"Create 1:1 v mix of methanol : toluene.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Methylation- formation of fatty acid methyl esters
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"904h0","text":"Add 0.5 mL of the methanol : toluene solution to each sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"du23i","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.5","guid":"B9621C0FE35E4C8F97123EA2148CE356","id":"6546","label":"methanol : toluene solution","unit":"2"}}}}

steps.section: Methylation- formation of fatty acid methyl esters
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ej124","text":"Add 0.5 mL of KOH in methanol to each sample. Vortex for 30 seconds.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"d9soh","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"3t21u","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.5","guid":"D5720B7EE4DC4537AB10ABBB56042BFC","id":"6547","label":"KOH in methanol","unit":"2"}},"1":{"type":"command","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"description":"30s","guid":"47A4AC88341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","name":"VORTEX","os_name":"","os_version":""}}}}

steps.section: Methylation- formation of fatty acid methyl esters
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"664so","text":"Place in water bath heated to 37 °C for 15 minutes. steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"58g6n","text":"Add 0.5 mL of acetic acid to each tube.   May look milky/chunky. steps.section: Methylation- formation of fatty acid methyl esters
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"84kb6","text":"Add 2 mL of chloroform to all samples followed immediately by 2 mL of chloroform-extracted DI water. Vortex for 30 seconds.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"d5uh1","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"ej3dl","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"517u6","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","guid":"FE282E3E64F3423DA8FDDE4234FD88D1","id":"6549","label":"chloroform","unit":"2"}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","guid":"AC21B144D8C24E0C8F32C49CD49DCBC1","id":"6550","label":"chloroform-extracted DI water","unit":"2"}},"2":{"type":"command","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"description":"30s ","guid":"47A4ACCB341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","name":"VORTEX","os_name":"","os_version":""}}}}

steps.section: Methylation- formation of fatty acid methyl esters
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ca802","text":"Centrifuge samples for 5 minutes.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"aqc1f","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"command","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"description":"5 minutes","guid":"47A4AD0B341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","name":"CENTRIFUGE","os_name":"","os_version":""}}}}

steps.section: Methylation- formation of fatty acid methyl esters
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2ofqs","text":"Pipette out bottom (organic) layer into a new test tube being careful not to transfer any of the aqueous phase.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Methylation- formation of fatty acid methyl esters
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ev3oe","text":"Add 1 mL of chloroform to each of the original sample tubes.  Vortex for 30 seconds.  Centrifuge for 5 minutes.  Pipette organic (lower) layer into the new test tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4b4lo","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"7dpaa","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"9n2bd","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","guid":"5B3AEE014EC443E6A24CC44BD1BFE648","id":"6551","label":"chloroform","unit":"2"}},"1":{"type":"command","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"description":"30s","guid":"47A4AD4C341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","name":"VORTEX","os_name":"","os_version":""}},"2":{"type":"command","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"description":"5 min","guid":"47A4AD8E341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","name":"CENTRIFUGE","os_name":"","os_version":""}}}}

steps.section: Methylation- formation of fatty acid methyl esters
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"vbui","text":"Repeat step 38.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"aua4t","text":"   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":1,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"gotostep","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"333ED194A0F111EEBB4A02C0B41BC903","step_guid":"06ABD37AB746404D9B7CE59F3E4D4929","title":""}}}}

steps.section: Methylation- formation of fatty acid methyl esters
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"f3gk7","text":"Add 1 mL of chloroform to each of the original test tubes but DO NOT VORTEX OR CENTRIFUGE.  Transfer chloroform to new test tubes.  New test tubes should now contain FAMEs in 5 mL of chloroform Remove chloroform under N2 blow-down.  Store samples at –20 °C until identified by gas chromatography.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":219,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8h5iu","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","guid":"004508C5D30A467D8E6E1717A2D292BD","id":"6552","label":"chloroform","unit":"2"}}}}

steps.section: Separation, Quantification and Identification
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6cikj","text":"Resuspend FAMEs in hexane. Include a known amount of an internal standard.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Separation, Quantification and Identification
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8hcsr","text":"Transfer to GC vial with PTFE septa cap.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Separation, Quantification and Identification
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"768sq","text":"Identify by retention time/co-elution with standards on a GC ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Separation, Quantification and Identification
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"53l49","text":"Molar concentrations of each fatty acid can be determined by relationship between area of standard peak and known concentration of standard.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
